SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatx1005.observer

Class TaskEventManager

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatx1005.observer.TaskEventManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
TaskEventSubject
public class TaskEventManager extends Object implements TaskEventSubject

TaskEventManager class

Manages task-related events and notifications in the application. This class coordinates between the data layer (DatabaseService) and UI components by providing event notifications when task-related changes occur.

Since:
V1.1.0
Author:
William Holtsdalen

      public void removeObserver(TaskEventObserver observer)

      Parameters:

    • notifyObservers

      public void notifyObservers()
      Method for notifying all observers of task-related events. This method is not directly used as we have specific methods for each event type.
      Specified by:
      notifyObservers in interface TaskEventSubject

    • setLoggedInUser

      public void setLoggedInUser(User user)

    • createTask

      public void createTask(String title, String description, LocalDateTime dueDate, Priority priority, Size size, List<UUID> assignedUserIds)
      Creates a new task in the database with the given parameters, by calling the appropriate method in the DatabaseService class. It then notifies all observers of the task creation.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the task to create
      description - the description of the task to create
      dueDate - the due date of the task to create
      priority - the priority of the task to create
      size - the size of the task to create
      assignedUserIds - the list of assigned user ids of the task to create

    • updateTask

      public void updateTask(Task task)
      Updates the task in the database with the given task's id, by calling the appropriate method in the DatabaseService class. It then notifies all observers of the task update.
      Parameters:
      task - the task to update

    • deleteTask

      public void deleteTask(Task task)
      Deletes the given task from the database, by calling the appropriate method in the DatabaseService class. It then notifies all observers of the task deletion.
      Parameters:
      task - the task to delete

    • assignTask

      public void assignTask(Task task, User user)
      Assigns the given task to the given user, by calling the appropriate method in the DatabaseService class. It then notifies all observers of the task assignment.
      Parameters:
      task - the task to assign
      user - the user to assign the task to

    • completeTask

      public void completeTask(Task task)
      Marks the given task as completed, by calling the appropriate method in the DatabaseService class. It then notifies all observers of the task completion.
      Parameters:
      task - the task to mark as completed

    • refreshCache

      public void refreshCache()
      Refreshes the cache, by calling the appropriate method in the H2Manager class. It then notifies all observers of the cache refresh.
